s_matrix - Variable in class Grid
 
saveState() - Method in class Grid
Saves the previous state of the grid in a stack so undo moves can be performed.
selectColor1() - Method in class SettingsController
This function takes the value of 1st color picker initialises the 0th index of the main colour array If the colour selected is white it shows an error If the colour selected is already selected by another player then also it shows an error The error is shown in a pop up window which can be exited by pressing ESCAPE button It resets the value to the original on after exiting the error window
